Package model

Class BattleshipModel

java.lang.Object
java.util.Observable
model.BattleshipModel
public class BattleshipModel extends Observable
This class represents the model component of the Battleship game which uses the MVC architecture. Each player will have their own instance of the model that stores the data of each player. That data being the player's current grid and what ships the player placed and which spot was a hit or a miss. This model also stores a grid that has what information the current player has from the opposing player's grid. Finally, the model also stores an answer the it shows to the other player once the game is over. The model follows the Observer/Observable design in that the model is the Observable and notifies the observer(the view) that it has updated.
Author:
Luke Genova, Amimul Ehsan Zoha

    • addShip

      public void addShip(Point coord, int size, int dir)
      This method adds a ship to the grid by use the position of the front of the ship and iterating through the grid and changing what is inside a position based on the size and the direction of the ship. Notifies the view when the model added the ships.
      Parameters:
      coord - A Point object that holds the x and y position on the ship will be placed.
      size - An integer that holds the size of the ship.
      dir - An integer that determines which direction the user is going to place their ship.

    • moveResult

      public void moveResult(Point coord)
      This method takes in a grid that holds the position on where the other player attacked and determines if the attack hit a ship or missed.
      Parameters:
      coord - A Point object that holds the x and y position on the ship will be placed.

    • updateOpponentGrid

      public void updateOpponentGrid(POSITION_RESULT[][] updatedGrid, boolean gameEnded)
      This method takes in an updated grid from the opposing player that resulted from the current player's move and updates its current information of the opponent's grid.
      Parameters:
      updatedGrid - A grid of constants that represents the opponent's updated grid after the current player made a move.
      gameEnded - A boolean value that determines if the view can show the opponents ship locations after the game ends.

    • getPlayerProgressGrid

      public POSITION_RESULT[][] getPlayerProgressGrid()
      Returns the current player's grid.
      Returns:
      the current player's grid.

    • getPlayerAnswerGrid

      public POSITION_RESULT[][] getPlayerAnswerGrid()
      Returns a grid that contains the locations of all the ships before there was any attacks. Used at the end to show where the opponents ships were.
      Returns:
      a grid that contains the locations of all the ships.

    • getOpponentGrid

      public POSITION_RESULT[][] getOpponentGrid()
      Returns a grid that contains the locations of all the attacks the current player had made to the opposing player's grid.
      Returns:
      a grid that contains the locations of all the attacks the current player had made to the opposing player's grid.
